reviewText: I just adore John Bytheway. I love how he explains the Sabbath Day.

This is a DVD of a fireside for youth about sacrament meeting and the sacrament.  However as a middle aged adult I loved it!.  My parents recommended it to me and they are great-grand parents.  I think everyone should watch it.
THE BEST 3 HOURS OF THE WEEK.John Bytheway is one of my most favorite authors.  I will continue to read his books and articles.  Thanks for making them available!
This DVD is good for kids and adults to watch. I would recommend watching it as a family and discussing the things that are talked about in the DVD.
This DVD really simplifies those principles that we should make important in our lives and puts them on the level a teenager can understand. Great insight and inspiration.
We really enjoyed this DVD! This message is Uplifting and Thought-provoking. Made me appreciate church even more! Love it! Love John Bytheway! He's great!
